title: Someone's account may have been hacked?
body:
Someone I added on league after a game a really long time ago (Summoner Name "DuthThouHoist") recently sent me this message: 

  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
dude go get your mystery skin its fuc*in amazing i got Spirit udyr

Has anyone else gotten this message? I'm afraid that either his account has been hacked, or he's just sending malicious messages for no reason. 
Can anyone help with this?

Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Edited out that website as it's most likely a phishing website designed to steal your account information. If you think your account might be in danger of being hacked, go ahead and hit up our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to help out.
Yeah that message was not sent by me and was indeed a compromise in my account. I have since changed the password and will take up further action with the support team.

Wow, he sent me that message too but I've been friends with him for a month or so. His message seemed odd, so I searched online to see if this was legit. Your post and me knowing the guy leads me to think this is a fake message and probably hacking. :( Hope he can recover it soon.
